1.title: Starting a new adventurer.

11.content: Now then what is your species?
11.title: Male?

113.content:
Your name is Rayn the Wolf.. or at least, that's the name you go by now. You old name was... quite frankly, you don't even remember it, only the first name. Hours ago, you were a human from Earth playing a Sonic game that now you don't remember (You had some selective amnesia).

Until from nowhere, A creepy Tails-looking Doll appeared just on front on you and kipnapped you to god-know where through a fucking portal.

Not only that, he altered you to look like a character from Sonic. That's right. You were a now an anthropomorphic White Wolf with literally nothing on except your shoes and black gloves.

The doll left you on...
113.title: Rayn the Wolf

114.content:
Okay let's recall whatever the fuck just happened:

You were in your room, playing Sonic Mania Plus, when suddenly, a pink portal opened under where you were sitting, so you unavoidably fell in, and somehow ended up in Mobius.

You recall that your name was Jesse, and you were a 14 year old boy. When you came to, you looked down to see how badly injured you were from the impact, but when you looked down, you saw that you were completely different. You looked around and found a small pond, so you get up and walk over to it, and look in. When you saw your reflection, you had two ears sticking out from the top of your head, which you immediately recognized as fox ears, a tan-ish muzzle, and yellow fur. You were still wearing the same clothes as you had before: a grey hoodie, a pair of blue jeans, and a pair of grey sneakers. However you also noticed that you were wearing a pair of grey gloves with blue dots on them. And speaking of stuff that was off, you also had a fox tail.

As you were absorbing all of this, a familiar face showed up and noticed you, and walked up to you to see if you were okay.

They were:
114.title: The Adventures of Jesse the Fox

1142.content:
"Excuse me, mister?" a small child-like voice said. You froze in place, only turning to see who was behind you.

You immediately recognized them as Cream the Rabbit, with, of course, Cheese floating right by her side. You were greatly relieved that you weren't going to have to deal with one of Eggman's goons... for now at the very least.

When Cream approached you, she asked "What's your name?" You told her "Jesse." and she...
1142.title: Cream

choices: She asks you to be her boyfriend

1252.title: Winnie The Wolf

12523.content: You look up to see Tails sticking out his hand. "Need some help?" he asks. you...
12523.title: Tails helps you up

1353.title: Hybrid species?
